title: The Owl and the Pussycat
description: The Owl and the Pussycat is a charming retelling of the classic story, told in rhyme. In this story, the owl and the pussycat decide to sail away to be together. When they arrive at their destination, they are married by the turkey who lives on the hill and live happily ever after.
meta: beautiful, fowl, guitar, owl, pussycat, wonderfully
Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand text
Sequence Events : Identify the sequence of a story
Diphthongs : Read and write words with the diphthong /ou/ letter combinations ow and ou
Compound Words : Recognize and understand compound words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
